workstreams.name: Zoning Data Acquisition
workstreams.summary: 10 cities acquired — 120K+ zones, ~566 MB across TX, CA, FL, OK
details: Pipeline built: acquire.py with pagination, batch mode, point-in-polygon testing
CA: Los Angeles (58K zones), Sacramento (11K), San Francisco (1.6K)
TX: Austin (22K zones), Dallas (3.8K)
FL: Tampa (11K zones), Miami-Dade (4K), Orlando (2K), Fort Lauderdale (739)
OK: Norman (4.4K zones) — proof of concept
Not available: Houston (no zoning), San Antonio (too large), Fort Worth/San Diego/San Jose/Jacksonville (no public service)

workstreams.name: Next Cities Pipeline
details: Wave 1 (next): Washington DC, Philadelphia, Boston
Wave 2: Los Angeles, Detroit, Savannah
Wave 3: Miami, Charleston, Pittsburgh, Nashville
Philadelphia identified as sweet spot — rich architecture, underserved SEO
